title: test: heapsampling.go is flaky
body:
heapsampling.go is flaky.

It needs to either be fixed to not be flaky, or be deleted.

/cc @aclements @dr2chase @dvyukov and @rauls5382 (who appears to be the first and only person to ever touch that file when it was added in https://go-review.googlesource.com/14590 for #12620)
